messages.subject: Re: World Holidays
messages.msgSnippet: Melanie: ck this out... Holidays on the Net, at http://www.holidays.net/ ... completing), I want to put up a world holidays calendar.  Every day is a holiday
messages.messageBody:
Melanie: ck this out...

Holidays on the
Net, at http://www.holidays.net/

>>for my website (that I don't know if I'll ever get around to
completing), I want to put up a world holidays calendar. Every day is a
holiday somewhere, in some culture, in some religion. So if anyone can
help me - I don't know enough about, for example, Jewish and Moslem
holidays.

Thank you.

Love, Melanie in Japan

Check it out!
http://www.unschooling.com

messages.subject: Re: World Holidays
messages.msgSnippet: I want to know more about Paganism.  What is the difference between being Pagan and being atheist? What are Pagan holidays? I do love learning things I don t
messages.messageBody:
I want to know more about Paganism. What is the difference between being
Pagan and being atheist?
What are Pagan holidays?

I do love learning things I don't know about.
Ann

messages.subject: World Holidays
messages.msgSnippet: For my website (that I don t know if I ll ever get around to completing), I want to put up a world holidays calendar.  Every day is a holiday somewhere, in
messages.messageBody:
For my website (that I don't know if I'll ever get around to
completing), I want to put up a world holidays calendar. Every day is a
holiday somewhere, in some culture, in some religion. So if anyone can
help me - I don't know enough about, for example, Jewish and Moslem
holidays.

Thank you.

Love, Melanie in Japan
